revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Tenda |model=4G301 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/21/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=3G mobile router |fcc_id=V7T4G301 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620N;MT7620N, 1325-BMSL, CTPRC091; |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q32BSIG |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620N;MT7620N, 1325-BMSL, CTPRC091; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=none |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=portable, battery, 3G/4G modem capable |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Tenda_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Tenda_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless N300 3G/4G Router w/ 5200mAh Mobile Power Bank}}
"10016874" <??>, "V1.0", and a lead-free logo looks to be silkscreened :on the main board in the FCC photos. :"10017725" (1) / "10017724" (2) and "V1.0" + a lead-free logo (both) :is silkscreened on the antenna boards.
Default settings (including the SSID) are per the FCC manual + label..
The FCC photos show the batteries (there's two..) used as :('''Dongguan Kanyo Battery'''?) KANYOIRC18950F8s (3.7V, 2600mAh).
